name: ashtech-pages-blocks
description: Gutenberg blocks for Ashtech website pages

scripts.build: wp-scripts build home-page/index.js project-page/index.js nri-page/index.js about-page/index.js resources-page/index.js career-page/index.js contact-page/index.js terms-page/index.js privacy-page/index.js --output-path=build
scripts.start: wp-scripts start home-page/index.js project-page/index.js nri-page/index.js about-page/index.js resources-page/index.js career-page/index.js contact-page/index.js terms-page/index.js privacy-page/index.js --output-path=build

author: Ashtech
